description: This table stores the outstanding actions for the covered status of a member on a coverage record.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUTST_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action category ID for this member on the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Special Enrollment Period Verification


Binder Payment


Enrollment Geographic Area Verification


Non-Covered Subscriber

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUTST_ACT_RES_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action resolution category ID for member on the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Not Resolved


Approved


Denied


Canceled


Paid


Failed To Pay


Geographic Area Verification Passed


Subscriber Gained Coverage


Resolved


Under Investigation


Temporary Address


In Geographic Area


Out of Geographic Area

columns.name: APN_QUAL_EVNT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action qualifying event category ID for the member on the coverage record.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: QUALIFYING_EVENT_DATE
columns.description: The qualifying event date for this outstanding action for the member on the coverage record.

columns.name: CVD_STAT_OUT_ACT_DENIAL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The covered status outstanding action denial reason on the coverage. This is extracted as the category title.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined
